config.text: Service description starts here. Provide a brief overview of the service, highlighting key features and essential information to engage users effectively.

### Before you start

- Ensure you have all necessary documents ready.
- Review the instructions carefully before proceeding.
- Note any specific requirements for your application.

hint.text: Set up your profile and access your dashboard.

Let us know about your experience.

title: Create an account or sign in

config.summaryText: Choose how you want to sign in to your account. This helps us provide a secure experience tailored to your needs.
config.text:
Please select one of the following options for signing in to your account:

- **Email and Password**: Use your email address and a secure password.
- **Government Gateway**: Use your existing Government Gateway credentials if you have them.

If you have any questions about choosing the right option, please check our [Help section](#) for more information.

config.summaryText: Details about your registered office address
config.text:
Please provide the full registered office address for your company. This should include:
- Address line 1
- Address line 2 (if applicable)
- City
- Postcode

Make sure the address is accurate and matches the one registered with Companies House.

### Directors List

Please provide the full names of all directors in your organization. 

This information is essential for compliance and regulatory purposes. Make sure to include:
- First and last names
- Current roles or titles

If there are more than five directors, please use a separate document to list additional names.

### Important Information

Please ensure that you read the following guidelines carefully. This section will provide essential context for completing the application form.

config.summaryText: Details component allows for expandable content sections, providing a way to hide or reveal additional information either within a page or within modals.
config.text:
### Details Component Configuration

#### Labels
- **Summary Label**: A concise and informative label that summarizes the content, e.g., "More information about our services."

#### Hints
- **Hint Text**: A brief instruction or description of what the user can expect when they click on the summary. Keep it under 100 characters for clarity, e.g., "Click to expand and read more about our services."

#### Validations
- **Required Validation**: Ensure the summary is not left blank. Display a message if the summary field is empty.

#### Default Values
- **Expandable State**: The component should default to 'collapsed' to reduce initial information overload. 
- **Content Display**: Optional content to be displayed when expanded; ensure this is instructive and useful for users.

config.hint: Please upload a PDF or Word document. Maximum file size is 5MB.
config.name: model_articles_upload_file

config.hint: Provide a brief description of your business activities, including primary functions and services.
config.name: business_activity_description

config.hint: Enter the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code for your business activity.
config.name: business_activity_sic_code

config.summaryText: Learn more about the business activity classification and Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) codes.
config.text: The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) system is used to categorize the primary business activities of companies. This helps in collecting, analyzing, and publishing statistical data related to the economy. Each type of business activity has a specific SIC code, which is a 5- or 6-digit number. Knowing the right SIC code for your business is essential for compliance, regulatory purposes, and data reporting.

### Declaration

Please read the following declaration carefully. You must agree to the terms and conditions outlined below before proceeding. Make sure you understand your responsibilities and the implications of your actions.

config.hint: Please confirm your agreement to the terms and conditions.
config.name: declaration_confirm
